    • findReview

      @GetMapping("/findById/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReviewsDTO> findReview(@PathVariable("id") String reviewsId)
      Retrieves the review with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      reviewsId - The ID of the review to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object with the DTO of the found review and HttpStatus.OK if the review was found

    • userInsert

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView userInsert(@Valid @Valid ReviewsDTO reviewsDTO)
      Inserts a new review submitted by the user.
      Parameters:
      reviewsDTO - The ReviewsDTO object representing the review to be inserted
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object redirecting to the customer page with a success or failure message

    • updateReviewR

      @PostMapping("/updateReview/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateReviewR(@PathVariable("id") String reviewId, ReviewsDTO reviewsDTO)

      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of the review to be updated
      reviewsDTO - The DTO containing the new information for the review to be updated

    • findAllReviewsBuyUser

      @GetMapping("/findAllReviewsByUser/") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView findAllReviewsBuyUser()
      Displays all reviews for the current user.
      Returns:
